fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action

2012 Energy Directive,  
Housing directives 
Cohesion policies 
EUROSTAT rules on EnPC
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: All in connection with Energy Efficiency, especially EASME, financing *EIB, ELENA
goals__remit: To address the housing crisis in EE as it accelerates from simple housing poverty to lack of housing by developing a EE wide industry to renovate, renew existing building stock using energy savings as the finance tool: “ the Esko Ekosystem aligns the interests of all stakeholders on those of the final beneficiary: the homeowner.”
